wrong battle Logo, Hot rod and co. are at the Cybertronian fire, 
we're at the Ark. They're two seprate bases in two parts of the world.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She opened her commlink to Lunarpine. "Hellbeast and Hotrod are 
> fighting.  A lioness is attacking as well.  A few other Maximals 
are 
> still standing and fighting.  But I can't see the Ark all to clear, 
> too much smoke.  Give it a nano to clear and I can tell you more."
> She smiled.
> "OK, And I won't be a hero, unless You need it." She chuckled.
>
